title: [JS] Weather Date Sync
description: This resource syncs real weather of cities to the game.
author: resources/tastydev

title: [JS] In-Game Editor
description: A server/client-sided editor made for Alt:V MP and powered by the Monaco Editor
author: resources/tameemi

title: [JS] Fingerpointing
description: This resource allows players to point out things with their finger
author: resources/t4styy

title: [JS] OS Context Menus
description: This allows you to create a simple context menu for players to utilize. Which means they can hold left alt and right-click on objects to select different objects. Which is great for creating in-depth options for players to utilize.
author: resources/stuyk

title: [JS] Fuel Rats Gamemode
description: A free for all competitive gamemode where you smash your car into other players to capture a flag.
author: resources/stuyk

title: [JS] OS Global Text Labels
description: Easily create global text labels with custom color, font, scale, and distance. Text Labels are automatically synchronized when a player joins the server.
author: resources/stuyk

title: [JS] OS - Nametags
description: This repository provides a simple nametag system with optional health bars and armour bars. As well as hiding nametags when players are inside of vehicles. This nametag system scales based on distance as well as checks if you have direct line of sight with the opposing players. Nametags can be toggled completely off or on for a single player.
author: resources/stuyk

title: [JS] OS - oAuth2 Discord Login / Whitelist
description: oAuth2 Discord Login with optional whitelist for alt:V. If you ever wanted a login system where you integrate your alt:V server into Discord this is the easiest setup for such integration. Users will go through an official Discord Authorization page before being let into the server.
author: resources/stuyk

title: [JS] Open Roleplay
description: This project now serves as a reference for roleplay servers in the future. Includes various systems and examples as references.
author: resources/stuyk

title: [JS] OS - Register / Login
description: Very simple decoupled authentication resource that uses MongoDB, Vue, and PKDBF2 for Encryption.
author: resources/stuyk

title: [JS] OS - Character Editor
description: A robust character editor for editing player appearances and customizing them. This script allows a player to be sent to a character editor screen. Where they may customize their facial appearances. Includes presets, makeup, hairstyles, face customization for all features, and overlays. Also includes the ability to export character code and import it.
author: resources/stuyk

title: [JS] Postgres Database Wrapper
description: A database wrapper which uses TypeORM
author: resources/stuyk

title: [JS] Quickstart Repository
description: A starting point for starting an alt:V server with chat, commands, etc.
author: resources/stuyk

title: GTA:V Scenario List
description: A list of scenarios for GTA:V.
author: resources/santagain

title: [JS] alt:V Function Helpers
description: Few helpers for alt:V Multiplayer Development
author: resources/parpMoretti

title: [C#] alt:V Updater
description: A windows server update utility for the alt:V Platform
author: resources/parpMoretti

title: [JS] Webpack Plugin
description: This plugin will take all of your alt:V dependencies (alt, alt-client, alt-server), marks them as external dependencies, and adds a single ESM import at the top of each output file that will be used in place of all of these modules.
author: resources/micaww

title: [C#] Object Streamer using Entity Sync
description: ServerSide Streamer using EntitySync. Based on @DasNiels Work.

title: [JS] Freeroam Example Gamemode

title: [JS] Handling Edtior

title: [C#] Ped Syncer (Experimental)

description: A gangwar script with admin commands, stats, weapons, etc.

title: [JS] Smartphone Example Interface
description: Smart phone example. This is just a basis on which you can build a complete system.

title: [JS] Nicholas Speedometer Example
description: Simple vehicle tuning example.
author: resources/NicholasSchmitz

title: [JS] Vehicle Tuning
description: Simple vehicle tuning example.
author: resources/NicholasSchmitz

title: [JS] Client-Server Communication
description: The script provides the user with a simple API to make requests to the server and receive an asynchronous response from it, thus making the life of the developers simpler when it comes to receiving information from the server. The API is similar to the ESX API of FiveM so that developers coming from that platform will quickly become familiar with it.
author: resources/MrSentex

title: [JS] Interactions
description: This repository provides an alt:V resource to create interactions. This resource provides an easy way to create and remove interactions.
author: resources/LeonMrBonnie

title: [JS] Entity Sync
description: This repository provides an alt:V resource to work with the C# Entity Sync in JS. It provides an easy base class for entities that you can expand for you own entities.
author: resources/LeonMrBonnie

title: [JS] Mugshot
description: This repository provides an alt:V resource to show the player holding a mugshot board like in GTA Online. This resource provides two easy events to start and stop holding the mugshot board.
author: resources/LeonMrBonnie

title: [JS] Noclip
description: This repository provides an alt:V resource to allow the player to noclip. This resource provides two easy events to start and stop noclip for a player.
author: resources/LeonMrBonnie

title: [JS] Simple IPC
description: A simple implementation for IPC for alt:V.
author: resources/LeonMrBonnie

title: [TS] KifKick's Typescript Boilerplate
description: A boiler plate for writing typescript for alt:V
author: resources/KifKick

title: [JS] Ugly Progress Bar
description: An ugly progress bar snippet.
author: resources/KadirFiratFTW

title: [JS] Chat
description: Simple chat implementation for alt:V to get your server started with some player-to-player interaction.
author: resources/Dzeknjak

title: [JS] Global Blip Manager
description: This is a basic global blip manager resource. It allows you to create/destroy blips from the server-side for all players.
author: resources/Dzeknjak

title: [JS] Global Marker Manager
description: This is a basic global marker manager resource. It allows you to create/destroy markers from the server-side for all players.

title: [JS] Missing Interiors Loader
description: This resource basically fills in the gaps that are found across the map.

title: [JS] Online Radio
description: alt:V Radio resource replaces the default GTA V vehicle radio with custom online radio stations.

title: GTA-V Extracted Data Dumps
description: This is a collection of various GTA V data dumps mostly useful for modding & scripting. All of these are auto generated and some are enhanced with data from my GTA V researches.
author: resources/DurtyFree

title: [JS] Native UI
description: This project is a (fully TypeScript compatible) port of RageMP-NativeUI Kar for alt:V. It provides a simple way to use NativeUI menus in your clientside scripts. A lot of credits to datWeazel who made the initial port of the RageMP-NativeUI.
